Key Match Events: Felicio Milson scored an added-time goal to give Angola a 1-0 victory over Ghana
Home supporters threw plastic bottles onto the pitch after the final whistle
Pre-Game Insights: Ghana included six Premier League players in the starting lineup
120-cap midfielder Andre Ayew was overlooked by coach Otto Addo
Post-Match Reflections: Ghana's coach Otto Addo expressed disappointment with the result
Ghana's last loss at the Baba Yara Stadium was in 2000
Miscellaneous Highlights: Angola reached the 2024 Cup of Nations quarter-finals
Sudan and Angola share the Group F lead with Sudan
Others: Angola upset Ghana 1-0 in the AFCON qualifiers
Malawi twice equalised before losing to Burundi
